name: One Night at the SFDM: Okay you lost me Edition
name_original: One Night at the SFDM: Okay you lost me Edition
description:
A parody of FNaFb featuring all of your favorite 2hus, for the TH Game Jam (and not even halfway done yet)

Lots of stolen artwork, swears for no reason in particular, Shoutouts to SimpleFlips, and many more.
